main: ^Sky shadow : hi I’m sky shadow, shadow of the sky! Wanna be friends?
^What does shadow of the sky even mean?
^What do you know about lilac butterfly?
npc: ^Sky shadow: I’m like a shadow, but with the sky inside me?
info: ^Sky shadow: Her... her! she took everything from us! so we took everything from her!
info2: ^Sky shadow: She has plans. Big plans

c-0: ^Sky shadow: Well theres the stuff with the artefact that the moth girl.
^Sky shadow: oh and cant forget her plans to get back whats rightfully hers
^Sky shadow: plenty of pretty big plans.
